text: Phyllis Cox Berthoud (8 April 1887 - 1975) was a tennis player from unified Bengal, India. She participated in the Indian Open tennis tournaments between 1918 and 1923. Her entry into a Grand Slam event in 1920 was the first for an Indian woman. She died in Warwick in 1975. == References == Category:1887 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Indian female tennis players Category:Bengali sportspeople
title: Phyllis Cox Berthoud
